spec_data.Name: perl-Test-Cmd
spec_data.Description:
The Test::Cmd module provides a framework for portable automated testing
of executable commands and scripts (in any language, not just Perl),
especially commands and scripts that interace with the file system.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:37:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for portable testing of commands and scripts
